thread.title: Dvele Positions for Growth With Hiring of Seasoned Startup Executive, Greg Welch

author: cnbc.com
title: Dvele Positions for Growth With Hiring of Seasoned Startup Executive, Greg Welch

organizations.name: dvele positions for growth with hiring of seasoned startup executive

text:
SAN FRANCISCO--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Dvele announced today the appointment of Greg Welch to Chief Revenue Officer.
As Dvele’s Chief Revenue Officer, Welch is responsible for heading up long-term strategic initiatives and fueling high-growth sales and marketing opportunities. He brings to Dvele more than 25 years of leadership, growth and innovation in the tech industry.
“I’m excited to join the team and have the opportunity to help radically transform the home-building industry. We’ve seen companies attempt this with one or two specific aspects of the very complex home building process. We are closing the loop on a highly fragmented ecosystem and improving the process from the ground up,” said Welch. “Dvele has a truly unique solution to home building. The feedback we are getting from customers and partners is fantastic; I want to amplify that, and make sure everyone understands just how revolutionary Dvele homes are and what they can do.”
Welch joins longtime high-end prefab home entrepreneurs and founders, Kurt and Kris Goodjohn, and industry expert Brandon Weiss, who serves as Chief Innovation Officer. The team brings together experience in home building, technology, software, sustainability, and manufacturing.
“Greg has proven passion and expertise in building ecosystems. He implements technology to transform a company’s value and reimagine industries,” said Kurt Goodjohn, Dvele’s Chief Executive Officer. “He brings tremendous experience in deploying effective strategies that can strengthen Dvele’s effort in getting to market at a large scale. We are excited for the contribution Greg is sure to make in rolling out our technology platform that facilitates the design , production and supply of our healthy, modern, intelligent homes ”.
About Dvele
Founded by experienced high-end modular home experts who felt there was a better way, Dvele was created to reimagine homes from the ground up. Built on award-winning design, and state-of-the-art production technology, Dvele has developed the first end-to-end platform delivering the healthiest, greenest, smartest, luxury homes available.
This streamlined platform enables Dvele to deliver on and exceed more home performance benchmarks, provide a higher level of design, and consolidate more of the process in order to minimize the effort on part of the homeowner and merge a fragmented home building industry, resulting in houses that are produced in less time at a higher value due to the precision and control of the Dvele Operated Ecosystem.
